posts._title: Tony Smith – Theatre Night: Lady Windermere’s Fan (1985)
posts.title: Theatre Night: Lady Windermere’s Fan
posts.excerpt: With its author’s trademark wit, social satire and outrageous paradox, Wilde’s play shows us the destructiveness of gossip and superficial judgement, and examines the ambiguous sexual morality and gender politics at the heart of the British ruling class. Lady Windermere has a happy marriage – or, at least, that’s what she believes – until one …

posts._title: Abdellatif Kechiche – Mektoub, My Love: Canto Uno (2017)
posts.title: Mektoub, My Love: Canto Uno
posts.excerpt: Quote:Amin, an aspiring screenwriter living in Paris, returns home for the summer, to a fishing village in the South of France. It is a time of reconnecting with his family and his childhood friends. Together with his cousin Tony and his best friend Ophélie, he spends his time between the Tunisian restaurant run by his …

posts.title: Little Murders
posts.excerpt: Quote:Pitch black comedy about a young nihilistic New Yorker coping with pervasive urban violence, obscene phone calls, rusty water pipes, electrical blackouts, paranoia and ethnic-racial conflict during a typical summer of the 1970s.

posts.title: Freud
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:This pseudo-biographical movie depicts 5 years from 1885 on in the life of the Viennan psychologist Freud (1856-1939). At this time, most of his colleagues refuse to cure hysteric patients, because they believe they’re just simulating to gain attention. But Freud learns to use hypnosis to find out the reasons for the psychosis. His main …

posts.title: Gigi
posts.excerpt: Quote:Daniele Delorme is a turn-of-the-century teenage courtesan-in-training in the French romantic comedy Gigi (1948). posts._title: Akio Jissôji – Ubume no natsu AKA Summer of Ubume (2005)
posts.title: Ubume no natsu
posts.excerpt: During the 1950’s, a Tokyo woman from a wealthy family has been pregnant for 20 months while her husband has been missing for a year, apparently after vanishing from inside a locked room. She lives with her mother in a big house that seems to be part of the key for the long delayed delivery. …

posts.excerpt: Quote:On the night of a cat village’s Festival of the Stars, a kitten and his friend go on an celestial journey on a magical space locomotive. posts.title: The Uncanny
posts.excerpt: Quote:Wilbur Gray, a horror writer, has stumbled upon a terrible secret, that cats are supernatural creatures who really call the shots. In a desperate attempt to get others to believe him, Wilbur spews three tales of feline horror.

posts.title: Chain Lightning
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:Former World War II flying ace Matt Brennan (Humphrey Bogart) takes a position as a test pilot for a commercial aircraft corporation and bumps into his old girlfriend, Jo Holloway (Eleanor Parker), who now works as a receptionist for the company. posts.title: Le champignon des Carpathes (1990) (DVD)
